sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send Response Requested - No Due Date Notification
Wait until Approval is Approved or Rejected
Send Response Requested - With Due Date Notification
Set State to Pending and Approval to Requested
Send Revised Letter Approval Request Notification
Set State to Pending, Approval to Requested, and Reset Action Requested back to Review and Respond
Set State to Approved - Ready to Finalize
Wait until Action Requested is a Resubmittal
Set State to Re-submit and Approval to Rejected

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: and Action Requested is Review and Respond

sys_element_mapping.value: {{Created or Updated_1.current.u_request_type}}=letter approval request^{{Created or Updated_1.current.u_action_requested}}=review and respond^{{Created or Updated_1.current.approval}}!=approved^{{Created or Updated_1.current.state}}!=50
